downloadTitle: System Center 2012 R2 Management Pack for JEE Application Servers (2014/10)
downloadDescription: The Management Packs for JEE Application Servers enable discovering, monitoring, and managing JEE Application Servers with System Center 2012 R2 - Operations Manager.

downloadFile.name: System Center 2012 R2 Management Packs for Java EE.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/4/d/e/4dec2163-cdf0-4f27-a8d0-85592736778c/System Center 2012 R2 Management Packs for Java EE.msi

detailsSection:
The Management Packs for JEE application servers enable discovering, monitoring, and managing JEE application servers with System Center 2012 R2 – Operations Manager.
Feature Summary
System Center 2012 R2 Management Packs for JEE Application Servers
  • Apache Tomcat 5, Apache Tomcat 6, Apache Tomcat 7, Apache Tomcat 8
  • Red Hat JBoss 4, Red Hat JBoss 5, Red Hat JBoss 6, Red Hat JBoss EAP 6, JBoss Application Server 7, Wildfly Application Server 8
  • IBM WebSphere 7.0, and IBM WebSphere 8.0
  • Oracle WebLogic 10gR3, Oracle WebLogic 11, Oracle WebLogic 12cR1

Release History
  • System Center 2012 R2
    • 10/28/2014 - Initial Release - version 7.5.1038.0 for System Center 2012 R2
detailsSection_file_name: System Center 2012 R2 Management Packs for Java EE.msi
systemRequirementsSection: • Other Software: System Center 2012 R2 - Operations Manager or later
installInstructionSection:
1. Download and install the latest Update Rollup for System Center 2012 R2 – Operations Manager
  2. Download and install the latest UNIX and Linux management packs for the UNIX and Linux versions you are using. These management packs are located here http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=29696
  3. Download and install the updated management packs for the JEE Application Server you are using
  4. Follow the quick start instructions in the SCOMR2OM_JEE_Readme.txt
  5. Follow the configuration options located in the JEE MP guide
